Metadata.title: IntelliDoc AI - Smart Document Processing
Metadata.description: Upload your documents and let our AI extract text, analyze content, and convert files into structured data. Simple, fast, and secure document processing.

Hero.title: Smart Document
Hero.description: Upload your documents and let our AI extract text, analyze content, and convert files into structured data. Simple, fast, and secure.

features.title: Text Extraction
features.description: Extract text from PDFs, images, and documents with high accuracy OCR technology.

features.title: Format Conversion
features.description: Convert between document formats: PDF to text, images to searchable PDFs, and more.

features.title: Secure Processing
features.description: Your documents are processed securely and are not stored on our servers.

cta.text: Ready to process your documents? Start uploading below.

header.title: Upload Your Documents
header.description: Upload documents to extract insights, analyze content, and transform unstructured data into actionable intelligence. Our AI supports multiple formats and processes documents securely.

dropzone.title: Drag and drop your files here
dropzone.subtitle: or click to browse your files

validation.fileSizeError: File size must be less than 50MB
validation.fileTypeError: File type not supported. Please upload PDF, DOC, DOCX, TXT, or image files.
validation.duplicateFileError: File with this name already exists

brand.name: IntelliDoc AI
brand.description: Smart document processing made simple. Upload, extract, convert, and download your processed documents with AI-powered technology.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
items: Text extraction from PDFs and images

howToUse.title: How to Use
steps: Upload your documents using drag & drop
Wait for AI processing to complete
